subtitleNullable: Preprocessed Alzheimer Disease MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging)
descriptionNullable:
**Alzheimer MRI Preprocessed Dataset (128 x 128)**
- The Data is collected from several websites/hospitals/public repositories.
- The Dataset is consists of Preprocessed MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging) Images.
- All the images are resized into 128 x 128 pixels.
- The Dataset has four classes of images.
- The Dataset is consists of total 6400 MRI images.
**Class - 1:** Mild Demented (896 images)
**Class - 2:** Moderate Demented (64 images)
**Class - 3:** Non Demented (3200 images)
**Class - 4:** Very Mild Demented (2240 images)

**Motive**
The main motive behind sharing this dataset is to design/develop an accurate framework or architecture for the classification of Alzheimers Disease.

**References**
1. https://adni.loni.usc.edu/
2. https://www.alzheimers.net/
3. https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jboysen/mri-and-alzheimers
4. https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9521165
5. https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/alzheimers-disease-and-healthy-aging-data
6. https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-020-79243-9
7. https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/429468-the-final-epad-dataset-is-now-available-on-the-alzheimer-s-disease-workbench
